markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bottled Roc](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1947)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Expandable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=475" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 56 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bottle contains a shrunken bird preserved with its feathers intact. When opened, the contents reconstitute into a Gargantuan effigy of a great [roc](/Monsters.aspx?ID=352), which can appear in the air instead of on the ground. The roc [Grabs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) up to two creatures, then [Flies](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) up to 90 feet and [Releases](/Actions.aspx?ID=83) the creatures. The creatures must be within 15 feet of the roc for it to Grab them; if any of them are unwilling to be [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), the roc must [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) them with a +17 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier or fail to pick them up.

**Craft Requirements** Supply the corpse of a roc.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bottled Roc
